text: São Jorge Castle (English: Saint George Castle) is a historic castle in the Portuguese capital of Lisbon, it is located in the freguesia of Santa Maria Maior. The castle was used since in the 8th century BC, the first fortifications was built in the 1st century BC. == References == Category:Buildings and structures in Lisbon Category:Castles in Europe Category:8th-century buildings and structures
title: São Jorge Castle
